title: Calacalacity - Invitation
content:
This post is an invitation to take part in Calacalacity.

Calacalacity is an installation and a website project that take place in Lille, France.  
As part of "Bombaysers de Lille", a cultural event dealing with indian arts,  
we were asked to realise a project hosted at "La Maison de l'Architecture  
et de la Ville".

The project is composed of a fresco and the calacalacity.fr website.

The fresco aims to be the towncenter of this imaginery indian city.  
Visitors have the opportunity to create and develop it through a flash interface  
and to see their creations placed on the map.

It is indirectly link to typography as you may see in the image attached.

Please feel free to have a look around and to participate.

[http://www.calacalacity.fr](http://web.archive.org/web/20101023153222/http:/www.calacalacity.fr/ "http://www.calacalacity.fr")
